subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As the Yankees’ youngest reliever, Joba Chamberlain’s new role includes carrying an equipment bag to and from the bullpen. His impact on the rest of the team is expected to be far greater than that.
snippet: As the Yankees’ youngest reliever, Joba Chamberlain’s new role includes carrying an equipment bag to and from the bullpen. His impact on the rest of the team is expected to be far greater than that.
